column1: So, you are the little boy who's been taking all our work?!
You must pay the twenty five dollar fee and give us ten percent of your earnings!
Very well, then you give us no choice. Roger?
Enough!  We are ...obviously quite evenly matched. I guess this will have to be settled in court.
We brought a class-action lawsuit against you! We'll see you before the judge tomorrow!
Well young man, I guess that just leaves one score to settle.
